item.title: Welcome to My Hugo Site
item.description:
Welcome to My Hugo Site!

This is my first post on my new Hugo website. Hugo is an amazing static site generator that makes it easy to create fast, secure websites.

What is Hugo?

Hugo is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. With its amazing speed and flexibility, Hugo makes building websites fun again.

Getting Started

Here are some things you can do with your new Hugo site:

item.title: About the Lamoni Historical Association
item.description:
About the Lamoni Historical Association

Preserving and sharing the rich heritage of Lamoni, Iowa since 1962

Our Mission

The Lamoni Historical Association is dedicated to collecting, preserving, and sharing the rich history of Lamoni, Iowa and the surrounding area. We believe that understanding our past helps us build a stronger community for the future.

Through our museums, archives, educational programs, and special events, we work to ensure that the stories, artifacts, and traditions of our community remain accessible to current and future generations.

item.title: Our Projects & Initiatives
item.description:
Our Projects & Initiatives

Explore the diverse ways we preserve and celebrate Lamoni's rich heritage

Get Involved Browse Projects

Project Overview

From oral history collection to anniversary celebrations, our initiatives engage the community in preserving local heritage

Untold Lamoni Stories

Ongoing Oral History Project

Our flagship initiative collecting and preserving the personal histories that make our community unique. Through recorded interviews, written submissions, and photographic documentation, we capture the stories that official records don't tell - the daily life experiences, family traditions, and personal memories that reveal the true character of Lamoni.

item.title: Register for Events
item.description:
Register for LHA Events

Join us for upcoming events and help preserve Lamoni's rich history

Upcoming Events

Register for workshops, tours, and special historical events throughout the year

Historical Walking Tours

Register Now

item.title: Share Your Story
item.description:
Share Your Untold Lamoni Story

Help us preserve the personal histories that make our community unique

Your Stories Matter

Every family, every business, every individual who has called Lamoni home has stories worth preserving. These personal histories often reveal the most authentic and meaningful aspects of our community's heritage.

The Untold Lamoni Stories project is our effort to collect, document, and preserve these personal accounts for future generations. Whether it's memories of growing up on Main Street, running a local business, or participating in community traditions, your story is an important part of Lamoni's larger narrative.

item.title: Support Our Mission
item.description:
Support the Lamoni Historical Association

Help us preserve and share Lamoni's rich history for future generations

Why Your Support Matters

Every donation helps us maintain our historic buildings, digitize important documents, and create educational programs that keep our community's story alive.

üèõÔ∏è Historic Preservation

Maintain and restore historic buildings and landmarks throughout Lamoni, ensuring they remain accessible for future generations.

üìö Archive Digitization

Convert physical documents, photographs, and records into digital formats, making our history searchable and widely accessible.
